knimeNode.name: Keras Concatenate Layer
knimeNode.shortDescription: A layer that concatenates two inputs.

fullDescription.intro: A layer that concatenates two inputs along a specified axis. Corresponds to the Concatenate Keras layer . The inputs must be of the same shape except for the concatenation axis.
fullDescription.option: The name prefix of the layer. The prefix is complemented by an index suffix to obtain a unique layer name. If this option is unchecked, the name prefix is derived from the layer type.
The axis along which to concatenate. Note that axis 0 is the batch axis.

ports.inPort: The Keras deep learning network that is the first input of this Concatenate layer.
The Keras deep learning network that is the second input of this Concatenate layer.
ports.outPort: The two input Keras deep learning networks merged into one by the added Concatenate layer.
